tool_description: Identifies major chart patterns and configurations like stelliums, chart shapes, and planetary concentrations.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planetary longitudes in degrees.

planet_houses.description: Array indicating house placement for each planet.

stellium_orb.description: Orb in degrees for stellium detection (15-45).

error_messages: Array length mismatch: planet_longitudes and planet_houses must have same length.
Invalid longitude values: Must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
Invalid stellium orb: Must be between 15 and 45 degrees.
Invalid minimum planets: Must be between 3 and 5 planets for stellium.
usage: Provide planetary longitudes and house positions, set stellium detection parameters to identify major chart patterns and planetary distributions.

stelliums.description: Detected stelliums with participating planets and signs/houses

chart_shape.description: Overall chart pattern (bowl, bucket, locomotive, splash, etc.)
